artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Claude-Louis Desrais; Artist: after Charpentier; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with green paper covers unbound with two hand-colored engravings of people in fashionable period dress and one hand-colored engraving of a couch (P.15,191, P.15,192, P.15,193)
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Dix-septième Cahier, 30 Avril 1787
